Working for the Aged 

     Waiting for the Truth.--It is wonderful how many aged people the workers find who need but little labor to lead them to receive the truth, Sabbath and all. Why, they say, this is what we have been praying for. We knew that the Scriptures had much to say upon subjects that the clergymen did not and could not explain to us. These do little else but rejoice 
                                                                           447
in the light and in the truth. Their joy seems to be full.--Letter 18, 1898.
